prompt:
How do you write a story about your pet?
I would like to tell a funny story about my cat, Bob. My cat has always been very curious and playful. Recently, I noticed that he was especially interested in our laptop screen, so one day I decided to let him watch some cat videos on it. However, he ended up playing with the keyboard instead of watching the videos! He even managed to type a few random words, which were hilarious to see.
